revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gemtek |model=WHRTC-100GW |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=12/28/2004 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=wireless router, Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=MXF-HR930819G |ic_id= |pwr_v=110-120 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Conexant |cpu2_model=CX90010-11 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C3BD70 |ram1= |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6063 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=HomePlug 1.0 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default |default_ip=10.0.0.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Home Plug Wireless 802.11g Router}} :[http://www.gemtek.com.tw/pro_whrtc100.html Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.gemtek.com.tw/specs/WHRTC-100GW%20Product%20Spec.pdf Spec.]
"WHRTC-100GW_V03" and "ENG-103-8603" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device is using a '''SiGe''' SE2525L 2.4GHz power amplifier.
Default settings are per the FCC ''manual''. They very well may be completely wrong. :The WWW interface's ''realm'' is noted as '''Wireless + HomePlug Design''' :in the IE password prompt box for the web UI.
